level.text: The purpose of this chapter is to establish standards under which the District of Columbia Child and Family Services Agency (CFSA) and its subcontractors, shall qualify to participate as providers of targeted case management (TCM) services.
CFSA shall enter into a provider agreement with the Department of Health, Medical Assistance Administration (MAA) for the provision of TCM services.
The provider agreement shall specify the services to be provided, methods of operation, financial and legal requirements, and identification of the population to be served.
